entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
